edu.umass.cs.gnsserver.gnsapp

Interface GNSApplicationInterface<NodeIDType>

  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIDType -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GNSApp

    public interface GNSApplicationInterface<NodeIDType>
    This pulls out some methods from GnsReconfigurableInterface that were needed for transition to new app framework.
    Author:
    westy
